Speed Tech: Accelerating Possibilities

Welcome to SpeedTech – Your One-Stop Tech Agency!

Our team of talented experts, fueled by passion and creativity, works diligently to deliver solutions that exceed expectations and propel your brand to the forefront of the digital landscape. Embrace the future with SpeedTech as your reliable partner, and together, let’s embark on an exciting journey of growth and success. Experience the speed of technology like never before!

Get Started

At SpeedTech

We Harness the Power of
Innovation to drive your Business Forward

As a cutting-edge technology company,

we offer a comprehensive suite of services to cater to your digital needs.

App Development

Harnessing the power of cutting-edge technologies, we create dynamic and user-friendly mobile apps that elevate your brand presence.

Learn More

Blockchain Development

Embrace the decentralized future with our expert blockchain solutions that guarantee security, transparency, and efficiency for your business operations.

Learn More

Website Development

Your online presence is crucial, and our skilled developers craft captivating websites that leave a lasting impression on your audience.

Learn More

UI/UX Design

User experience is paramount, and our talented designers create visually stunning interfaces that captivate and engage your users.

Learn More

Game Development

Immerse your audience in thrilling virtual worlds with our exceptional game development services, tailored to match your vision.

Learn More

Bot Development

Automate and streamline your processes with our intelligent bot development, designed to boost productivity and customer satisfaction.

Learn More

About Speed Tech

Partner with us to experience technology like never before

Experience the thrill of progress with SpeedTech.

Together, we'll break barriers and conquer new frontiers in the world of technology."

Our Past Project

Creative Work.

Kingpin App

The Kingpin Sports Betting Tips & Picks app helps you beat the sports books by giving you access to picks from profitable experts, sharp pick algorithms, sports chat, and analysis for numerous games.
Live Preview

BetQL App

BetQL is a sports betting app that will take your online sports betting to the next level! See the latest odds, lines, sharp picks, public betting percentages and more all in one place.
Live Preview

Copy Text On Screen

This app lets you extract text and words from your mobile screen simply by sharing a screenshot. The OCR recognition accuracy is between 99% to 100%, ensuring that you get the exact text you need.

What Our Client
Are Saying About Us

They grasped the project requirements quickly, provided valuable insights, and delivered a high-quality smart contract that exceeded my expectations. Communication was excellent, and the seller was prompt in addressing my concerns. The code was clean, well-structured, and aligned perfectly with my requirements. The delivery was timely, showcasing their commitment to meeting deadlines. 

Aaron L. Dunford WESTANIQ

Nice job from the team in this step of the process. Communication could improve even more but the team compensate it with strong commitment and efforts to satisfy the client. Business partners!

Roland H. Lewis COSMOVERSE

They are adept at developing high-quality websites that are both visually stunning and user-friendly. Their attention to detail, creativity, and dedication to client satisfaction make them a top choice for any web development project.

Charles G. McKenzie DIOR
